How to install Java
How to install HTML
How to install JavaScript
How to install C#
How to install GIT
Java is a object-oriented programming language. It is a general-purpose programming language intended to let programmers write once, run anywhere (WORA).
1. Download and Install the Java Development Kit (JDK) at https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/downloads/
2. Open the Command Prompt or CMD.
3. type java or java -version to check whether Java is already installed
4. Install Java Extension in VSCode
5. Go to File-Preferences and type java home
6. click settings.json on Java > Jdt > Ls > Java : Home
7. make sure there\'s "java.jdt.ls.java.home": #your java version
8. Click ctrl+shift+p and type create java project.
9. Congratulations now you are ready to program in Java.
JavaScript often abbreviated as JS, is a programming language that is one of the core technologies of the World Wide Web, alongside HTML and CSS.
1. Already installed on Visual Studio Code
The HyperText Markup Language or HTML is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.
1. Already installed in Visual Studio Code.
